features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you

Polartec® Hardface® fleece blocked with Polartec® Power Grid® fleece: Polartec® Power Grid™ fleece increases warmth and breathability in a lightweight and durable design that reduces mass and maximizes performance, Polartec® Hardface® fleece increases abrasion resistance and water repellency
Stretch cuffs with stretch binding thumb loops, Abrasion-resistant panels on hard-wear areas
Breathable fleece under arms and on back
Zippered chest pocket, hand-warmer pockets, and sleeve pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
